headline: Extra Space Storage Inc. Announces 3rd Quarter 2025 Dividend
summary: Extra Space Storage Inc. (the "Company") (NYSE: EXR) announced today that the Company's board of directors has declared a third quarter 2025 dividend of $1.62 per share on the common stock of the Company. The dividend is payable on September 30, 2025, to stockholders of record at the close of business on September 15, 2025.

headline: Goldman Sachs downgrades Extra Space Storage on slow demand recovery
summary: Investing.com -- Goldman Sachs downgraded Extra Space Storage (NYSE:EXR) Inc. to Neutral from Buy, saying a sluggish recovery in storage demand and limited earnings growth leave the stock with fewer drivers after a strong run.
